Class CandidateResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.terrier.matching.daat.CandidateResult
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<CandidateResult>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FatCandidateResult

    public class CandidateResult
extends Object
implements Comparable<CandidateResult>
    A class used to when maintaining a top-k candidate documents ResultSet.
    Since:
    3.5
    Author:
    Nicola Tonnelotto
